name: Explorer
short_description:
Explorer Public Beta 1 has been released. This innovative new browser provides the latest in web and platform technology, including HTML5 and CSS. Based off the Awesomium framework (www.awesomium.com), this browser is much better than Internet Explorer and a competitor for the other big browsers.
    Explorer can be installed on Windows XP (x86) Service Pack 3, Windows Vista (x86/x86-64) Service Pack 1 or higher, Windows 7 (x86/x86-64) and Windows 8 (x86/x86-64).

Note: This software is in its first BETA form, therefore there can and will be many bugs, if any severe bugs arrive, notify us IMMEDIATELY so we can fix the problem as quick as possible.

The Awesomium Web Browser framework is coyright Khrona Inc.

The Explorer Web Browser is copyright under the Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike License. If you do not know what that means, go to http://creativecommons.org/licenses/
summary: The Explorer Web Browser from Cauble Software Solutions
